attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Ban the creation of additional new controlled parking zones and enforced purchase of permits in the city areas,  NUMBER 10, especially when the city authorities "sell" more permits than there are physical spaces to match them. This is cynical money raising. Could it also be Breach of Contract?

rejection.details: Petition main sentence is currently petitioning the PM “...to P. Napier”. This will need to be redrafted.
reasons: Statements that don't actually request any action
